ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Vier Dal?
ygData.msgSnippet: If you drop it on your characters portrait, it will auto-place the item.  If you think you may have the slot already taken up..    unequip everything, then try
ygData.messageBody:
If you drop it on your characters portrait, it will auto-place the item. If you think you may have the slot already taken up.. unequip everything, then try it. If it still doesn't equip.. it is meant to stay in your inventory. Not in a bag. In your main inventory.

Hope that helps.

Drev

>
> I found a Skull of Vier (something like that) in Lake Rathe. When I look at
> it is +20 mana and SV MAGIC 25. It is worth 3 plat to a merchant. It can
> be used by all classes and races. Not sure how the hell to use it though.
> I've tried removing my totem staff and placing it in my
> hand...nothing.....tried leaving it in my inventory...nothing. I have no
> clue how to use this nice item. Any suggestions?
>
> - Ziffnab
